relation: Darrow - #10 Buzz Buzz tells of the chosen four and King takes his leave. After all is said and done, Buzz Buzz joins the party! ...But that guy doesn't.
Darrow - #11 Starman Junior approaches! A battle ensues and we learn of his dark past. This page is a bit busy, but it was originally meant to be two pages.

Darrow - #12 The battle rages on! Ness, Picky, and Buzz Buzz go all out, but Starman Junior just won't quit. This page, again, was meant to be 2 pages but I didn't want to devote an entire page to the "attack" panel. Not the brightest of ideas, so the paneling may be a bit confusing on this one. It reads like this: 1(Ness/Starman), 2(Picky/Pokey), 3(Picky), 4(Starman), 5(Buzz/Ness/Starman), 6(Buzz), 7(Ness/Picky), 8(Ness/Picky/Buzz), 9(Starman), 10(Ness/Buzz), and then the four connected across the bottom. ...Yeah, sorry.
Darrow - #13 Starman Junior falls and, much to our dismay, steals an entire page of backstory. What a cad.

Darrow - #14 With Starman Junior defeated, everything is safe! OR IS IT?! I cannot be held responsible if Lardna Minch traumatizes anyone. I considered putting a big censor bar over her face, but...it was just too much trouble.
textBeforeTable: > D < Other Submissions by Darrow Ness deals a damaging blow to Frank and awakens a sleeping beast. Well, not so much sleeping. More like "hiding in the bushes offscreen" beast.
